## EFAshiny
`EFAshiny` is an user-friendly Shiny APP for EFA users who have some experiences with SPSS.
<!-- README.md is generated from README.Rmd. Please edit that file -->

#### Installation

https://psychilin.shinyapps.io/EFAshiny/

```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(devtools)
library(shiny)
runGitHub("EFAshiny", "PsyChiLin") 
```
